import React from "react"; import classNames from "classnames"; import { Line, Bar } from "react-chartjs-2"; import { Button, ButtonGroup, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, UncontrolledDropdown, Label, FormGroup, Form, Input, Table, Row, Col, UncontrolledTooltip, CardFooter, } from "reactstrap"; // core components import { chartExample1, chartExample2, chartExample3, chartExample4, } from "variables/charts.js"; import bgImage from "assets/img/bg5.jpg"; function Login (props) { return (
Welcome
); } export default Login;
